channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Acemagic just launched one of the weirdest-looking Ryzen AI Max+ 395 mini PCs to date - Tank M1A Pro+ supports 24TB storage, quad 8K screens and claims to match the RTX 4070M laptop GPU
item.description: Acemagic’s Tank M1A Pro+ joins the Ryzen AI Max+ 395 mini PC wave with support for four 8K screens, 128GB memory and up to 24TB SSD storage.

item.title: I bought the cheapest laptop on Amazon - here are 3 reasons why you really shouldn't do that
item.description: Can you get a decent Windows 11 laptop for a two-figure price? Probably not - but I'm going to waste TechRadar's money on it anyway.

item.title: How to watch Australia vs England: live stream Boxing Day 4th Ashes Test for *FREE* from anywhere in the world
item.description: All the ways to watch the 4th Ashes Test at the MCG, the famous Boxing Day Test, from anywhere as Australia and England battle in cricket’s historic series.

item.title: Amazon launches a massive after-Christmas sale — deals from Fitbit, AirPods, TVs, and more
item.description: Amazon's after-Christmas sale is live, and I'm rounding up today's 31 best deals, featuring clearance prices on smartwatches, TVs, blenders, headphones, and more.

item.title: This two-drawer Ninja air fryer is perfect for small kitchens – and it's 57% off for Boxing Day
item.description: Double the drawers means double the cooking space, but even the largest Ninja DoubleStack doesn't take up as much countertop space – grab it for just AU$259 this holiday season.

item.title: Our Favorite io9 Stories of 2025
item.description: Here's a roundup of the work we're most proud of from this year.

item.title: The 40 Best Movies on HBO Max Right Now (January 2026)
item.description: One Battle After Another, Spinal Tap II: The End Continues, and It's Never Over, Jeff Buckley are just a few of the movies you should be watching on HBO Max this month.

item.title: I love YouTube Premium – but it still needs these 5 upgrades in 2026 to make it perfect
item.description: There's still room for improvement when it comes to the digital subscription that I value the most.
